update LAW_INCOMING

JSON = #{json,jdbcType=CLOB},

ERROR_MSG = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where IN_ID = #{inId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and SOURCE_SYS_CODE = #{sourceSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
